sentences.en: Have they been overworking you again?
sentences.cn: 他们又让你超负荷工作了？
他因工作过于劳累而病倒了.

sentences.en: He died of a heart attack brought on by overwork.
sentences.cn: 他死于劳累过度引起的心脏病发作。

sentences.en: Her illness was induced by overwork.
sentences.cn: 她的病是操劳过度引起的.

sentences.en: His health collapsed because of overwork.
sentences.cn: 他的身体因工作过度而垮掉了.

sentences.en: His illness is attributable to overwork.
sentences.cn: 他的病可归因于劳累过度.

sentences.en: His illness was due to overwork.
sentences.cn: 他的病是由于工作过度.
他的病是因工作过度而引起的.

sentences.en: It might be prudent not to overwork those good angels.
sentences.cn: 不过还是谨慎点儿,别让这些善良的天使操劳过度.
过度劳累有损身体健康.
过分的工作把他们累倒了.

sentences.en: Overwork is the ruination of his health.
sentences.cn: 过度劳累搞垮了他的身体.

sentences.en: Take care not to overwork yourself.
The doctor said I must cut overwork out.
sentences.cn: 医生说我必须停止过度劳累.

sentences.en: We were bogged down by overwork.
sentences.cn: 我们被过度的工作累倒了.

sentences.en: You’ve been overworking – why don’t you take a week off?
sentences.cn: 你最近在超强度工作——为什么不休息一周呢？

words.tran_cn: 过度紧张的；过度兴奋的；过分劳累的；（文体等）过于考究的
工作过度；把…做过头；使过于激动（overwork的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to work too much or to make someone work too much
